full_summary:
# Veterans Online Caregiver Training Program

## Request for Proposal

[**Request ID: PW-23-01020491**, Solicitation Number: 3000754316]

Status: Expiré (Expired)

### Request for Proposal Details

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is closed to new responses, having expired on February 2, 2023, at 02:00:00.

The below details are provided for informational purposes only.

### Program Overview

Veterans Affairs Canada is seeking the services of a contractor to deliver an e-learning program for informal caregivers of Canada Veterans. The program aims to provide informal caregivers with support, resources, and training to effectively care for individuals with mental or physical health problems.

### Key Requirements

* Design, develop, and deliver an e-learning program that includes:
	+ Access to course content
	+ Peer support
	+ Interactive discussion boards
	+ Facilitation
* Program to be delivered on a secure online platform
* User-friendly interface with accessible content
* Ability to track participant engagement and progress

### Main Objectives

* Deliver an e-learning program that meets the needs of informal caregivers
* Provide support and training to caregivers of Canada Veterans with mental or physical health problems

### Period of Contract

The contract will be effective from the date of contract to March 31, 2024, with an option to extend up to four (4) additional one-year periods.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

Susan O'Brien
Email: [susan.obrien@veterans.gc.ca](mailto:susan.obrien@veterans.gc.ca)

### Attachments

The following attachments are available:

* Amendment 005 (Volatile Attachments)

Note: Additional attachments are available on the Canada Buys website, under the attachments section of this RFP.

### Business Classification

* Strategic Sourcing-Small Business (SRV)
* Day Early Appointment (DEA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Procurement Category: GSN 08101 (Training and Curriculum Development)
